original_text: Jesus said to him, “Have I been with you so long, and you still do not know me, Philip? Whoever has seen me has seen the Father. How can you say, ‘Show us the Father’?
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 빌립아 내가 이렇게 오래 너희와 함께 있으되 네가 나를 알지 못하느냐 나를 본 자는 아버지를 보았거늘 어찌하여 아버지를 보이라 하느냐

sentences.original_text: Have I been with you so long,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이렇게 오랫동안 너와 함께 있었는데,

sentences.original_text: and you still do not know me, Philip?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 아직도 나를 알지 못하느냐, 빌립아?

sentences.original_text: How can you say, ‘Show us the Father’?
